subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Malcolm Delaneyof Virginia Tech scored 21 points and the visiting Hokies held on to upset No. 1 Wake Forest, and Northwestern beat No. 7 Michigan State.
snippet: Malcolm Delaneyof Virginia Tech scored 21 points and the visiting Hokies held on to upset No. 1 Wake Forest, and Northwestern beat No. 7 Michigan State.
